body.text: Launched in 2021 by the PISA team in the Directorate for Education and Skills (EDU) at the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD), the Platform for Innovative Learning Assessments (PILA) draws on extensive research and expertise to provide interactive assessment tasks that communicate pertinent information to students and teachers on thinking and learning skills in STEM. PILA supports classroom and remote learning, as well as research on assessment and learning.
